item.title: Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition now available
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/mortal-kombat-1-definitive-edition-now-available

  • PC
  • PS5
  • Switch
  • Xbox Series

The most extensive Mortal Kombat 1 experience.

Publisher Warner Bros. Games and developer NetherRealm Studios have released Mortal Kombat 1: Definitive Edition for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, Switch, and PC via Steam and Epic Games Store. It is priced at $69.99 for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC, and $59.99 for Switch. The PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC versions can also be purchased as an upgrade pack to the base game for $59.99.

The Definitive Edition includes the following content:

  • Base Game
  • Khaos Reigns Story Expansion
    • Kombat Pack 2*
    • Noob Saibot
    • Cyrax
    • Sektor
    • Ghostface (Scream Franchise)
    • T-1000 (Terminator 2)
    • Conan the Barbarian
    • Madam Bo Kameo Fighter
  • Kombat Pack
    • Omni-Man (Invincible)
    • Quan Chi
    • Peacemaker (DC’s Peacemaker)
    • Ermac
    • Homelander (The Boys)
    • Takeda Takahashi
  • Kameo Fighters
    • Tremor
    • Khameleon
    • Janet Cage
    • Mavado
    • Ferra
  • Jean-Claude Van Damme Skin for Johnny Cage
  • 1250 Dragon Krystals
  • Mortal Kombat movie skins for Johnny Cage, Shao Khan, Kitana, Scorpion, and Sub-Zero
  • Tournament Liu Kang skin
  • Havik instant unlock
  • Kameo Unlock Pack
  • Shang Tsung fighter
  • Khaos Reigns pre-order skins (Wedding Scorpion, Ultimate MK3 Sub-Zero, Empress Mileena, Ultimate MK3 Noob Saibot)

item.title: Totally Reliable Delivery Service coming to PS5 and Xbox Series this summer alongside major update, two DLCs, and physical edition
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/totally-reliable-delivery-service-coming-to-ps5-and-xbox-series-this-summer-alongside-major-update-two-dlcs-and-physical-edition

  • PC
  • PS4
  • PS5
  • Smartphone
  • Switch
  • Xbox One
  • Xbox Series

Increased player count, cross-platform play, and more.

Publisher Infogrames and developer We’re Five Games will release PlayStation 5 and Xbox Series versions of Totally Reliable Delivery Service this summer alongside a free major update, two paid downloadable contents, and a physical edition for PlayStation 5 and Switch, the companies announced.

The major update will unify game features across the console, PC, and mobile versions of the game, as well as increase the player count from four to five, and add cross-platform play and universal leaderboards.

The new downloadable contents are titled “Atari Attire” and “Mascot Madness,” and will each add five new multiplayer events, 10 new delivery missions, and 15 new character skins. “Atari Attire” will feature character skins based on Atari games, including one surprise from Nightdive Studios, and launch early this summer for $2.99. “Mascot Madness” will follow on September 12 for $2.99.

The physical editions, dubbed the “Definitive Edition,” will launch on September 12 for $29.99 and include the new downloadable content, as well as all prior downloadable content (“Stunt Sets,” “Cyberfunk,” and “Dress Code”).

“We purchased Totally Reliable Delivery Service with the goal of building upon the game’s early success and expanding distribution,” said Infogrames manager Geoffroy Chateauvieux in a press release. “I am thrilled that we have been able to fulfill that goal, and can now bring an improved and expanded experience to both existing fans and new players.”

Here is an overview of the game, via Infogrames:

About

Buckle up your back brace and fire up the delivery truck, it’s time to deliver! Join up to three of your friends and haphazardly get the job done in an interactive sandbox world. Delivery attempted, that’s a Totally Reliable Delivery Service guarantee!

Key Features

  • Local and Online Multiplayer – Go it alone to ensure the safety of your deliveries, or join your friends and put your teamwork to the test.
  • Controlled Noodly Chaos – Unpredictable ragdoll physics meets snappy platforming. Sprint, leap, dive, and grapple with ease, but collide with something and you’ll be knocked out cold!
  • A World of Distractions – Take a break from deliveries and play around! The world is chock full of toys, vehicles, and machines that can be used for work or play.
  • Ragtag Crew – Customize your blue-collar workers and get your rear into gear, it’s time to deliver!

Totally Reliable Delivery Service is currently available for PlayStation 4, Xbox One, Switch, PC via Steam and Epic Games Store, iOS, and Android.

item.title: DreadOut Remastered Collection now available for PC
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/dreadout-remastered-collection-now-available-for-pc

  • PC

Previously released for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch.

DreadOut Remastered Collection is now available for PC via Steam, Soft Source Publishing and developer Digital Happiness announced. It is available at a 30 percent off discount price of $20.99 until May 21, after which the price will change to $29.99.

The collection, which includes DreadOut and DreadOut: Keepers of the Dark, first launched for PlayStation 5, PlayStation 4, and Switch on January 16.

Here is an overview of the collection, via its Steam page:

About

A collector’s dream! A compilation consisting of the original DreadOut and DreadOut: Keepers of the Dark.

About DreadOut

DreadOut is a third-person supernatural horror game where you play as Linda, a high school student trapped in an old abandoned town. Equipped with her trusty smart-phone and an SLR camera, she will battle against terrifying encounters and solve mysterious puzzles which will ultimately determine her fate.

Help her overcome the challenges that will stand before her. Survive the Dread!

When a group of high school students went astray from a field trip, they came across something totally unexpected. A town long forgotten, trapped in a peaceful state of slumber. What they did not realize was what lurks within. And what seemed like an innocent stroll turns into disaster as the secluded town reveals its dark and terrible secrets. The presence of sinister forces from beyond their realm of existence.

It all comes down to Linda. She will experience stirrings of unfamiliar powers, emerging from within her. These newfound abilities might just be the only way she can save her own life and those of her friends.

About DreadOut: Keepers of the Dark

DreadOut: Keepers of the Dark is a new standalone horror game that takes place in the DreadOut universe. In this missing chapter, you will help Linda face the challenges of the DreadOut world with even more dangers lurking within.

Follow the event in which Linda was transported by The Mysterious Lady in Red into The Mirror Realm. A portal of worlds that connects it to eight haunted dominions where over 13 horrific ghosts are ready to greet her in the most terrifying way possible. They will stop at nothing to thwart your main objective: To survive!

So, get your smart phone and SLR camera ready and choose your path wisely. The doors you open will decide the outcome of Linda’s fate.
